DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate whether sprayable PEG barrier is effective in reducing adhesions in laparoscopic gynecologic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Sprayable PEG Barrier in Gynecologic Laparoscopy
DOC.criteria: >18 years Undergoing gynecologic laparoscopy Suspected malignancy Incomplete adhesiolysis during initial laparoscopy Pregnancy Lactating Stage IV endometriosis
